trans:
1. Individual Vote - Vote for the 7 trainees you support!
2. Assembly Vote - Put together 14 trainees to complete "Your Idol"!
ğŸ“Œ Voting Information
- Please complete SMS authentication and subscribe to the PROJECT 7 community when voting for the first time.
- After completing the [Individual Vote], all [Assembly Votes] must be completed to be considered a valid vote.
- [Individual Vote] results will be reflected in the trainee's individual ranking.
- [Assembly Vote] results will be reflected in the formation of the next contest team.
ğŸ“Œ Voting Event
- Upon completing the voting mission, a Weverse Collection badge will be awarded, and 25 spectators will be selected through a lottery among those who have completed the vote.
ğŸ“Œ Voting Event Precautions
1. When participating in the voting, voting history (nickname, W ID) will be provided by Weverse Company to the SLL center for winner selection.
2. For event winners only, additional personal information (email address) will be provided to the SLL center.
- Purpose: To contact the winner for personal information necessary for prize delivery (name, date of birth, nationality, contact).
3. Event winners will be notified separately by email on November 2nd. If you do not respond to the email by noon (KST) on Monday, November 4th, you may not be able to receive the prize.
4. The personal information collected will only be used for prize delivery purposes.
- Retention and Use Period: The personal information will be retained for up to seven days after the winner announcement and used for one year from the winner's notification.
5. If you wish to refuse to provide personal information for prize delivery after winning the event, please submit your refusal to the "Customer Center." (If you do not express your intention to reject the use of your personal information by the end of the event, it will be considered implicit consent to provide your personal information.)
